question: 1.On Juma paryer I missed praying the 4 rakat of (qabl aljuma), can I pary it after the juma prayer.
answer:
QUESTION
1.On Juma paryer I missed praying the 4 rakat of (qabl aljuma), can I pary it after the juma prayer. 2.The khutba starts in our mosque after about 5-10 minutes from zuhur time, can I pray the 4 rakat of qabl aljuma before azan?
ANSWER


Share:
1. You may perform the 4 Rakaat Salaat after the Jumu?ah Salaat before expiry of Jumu?ah time. (Shaami vol.2 pg.59)

2. You may perform the Salaat before the Adhaan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
